text: tatha yadi ve sthaapit[1] rakhate tauraat aur injeel ko aur jo bhee unakee or utaara gaya hai, unake paalanahaar kee or se, to avashy apane oopar (aakaash) se tatha pairon ke neeche (dharatee) se[2], jeevika paate. unamen ek santulit samudaay bhee hai aur unamen se bahut-se kukarm kar rahe hain
